samples.name: Default Functionalities
samples.description: A simple, lightweight, and responsive DatePicker component for TypeScript for selecting date values easily with a rich user interface and cross-browser compatibility

samples.name: Disabled Dates
samples.description: Customizable DatePicker widget for JavaScript (TypeScript) with disabled dates that restrict date selection from a defined set of days like weekends, holidays, etc

samples.name: Date Range
samples.description: DatePicker widget with min and max date options that restrict users from selecting dates within a defined range of days like past dates, future dates, etc

samples.name: Format
samples.description: Highly flexible DatePicker for JavaScript (TypeScript) with customizable options for date and time formats based on the preferred culture for improved readability

samples.name: Special Dates
samples.description: DatePicker for TypeScript that highlights multiple dates like weekends, holidays, and special events with options to add custom styles and descriptions
